title: LP-Based Mathematical Modeling Course for [Self-Directed] Integrated Energy Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic algebraic operations and graph interpretation
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening mathematical modeling competencies for energy system analysis, cultivating practical problem-solving skills to support workplace efficiency for professionals

learning_goals: Apply the law of energy conservation by mathematically modeling energy conversion processes.
Analyze energy system data and generate scientific explanations using graphs/functions.
Structure complex thinking processes for solving energy problems into three or more stages during LP (Learning Process)-based learning phases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
